dcterms:creator: A. D’Amico
Giacomo Borraccini
Vittorio Curri
dcterms:description: A dataset representing the C+L+S-band transmission scenario used for evaluating the perturbative solution of the inter-channel stimulated Raman scattering in optical fibers.
dcterms:title: C+L+S-band transmission scenario

dcterms:creator: A. D’Amico
Giacomo Borraccini
Vittorio Curri
dcterms:description: A dataset representing the U-to-E-band transmission scenario used for evaluating the perturbative solution of the inter-channel stimulated Raman scattering in optical fibers.
dcterms:title: U-to-E-band transmission scenario

dcterms:creator: Alessio Ferrari
Giacomo Borraccini
Vittorio Curri
dcterms:description: A dataset representing the standard single mode fiber (SSMF) characteristics used for assessing the achievable throughput of multi-band ITU-T G. 652. D fiber transmission systems.
dcterms:title: Standard single mode fiber (SSMF)

dcterms:creator: Erwan Pincemin
dcterms:description: A dataset containing the Raman gain coefficient profile for modern terrestrial transmission fibers in S-, C-, and L-band, used for evaluating the stimulated Raman scattering effects.
dcterms:title: Raman gain coefficient profile

dcterms:creator: S. Walker
dcterms:description: A dataset providing a rapid modeling and estimation of total spectral loss in optical fibers, used for evaluating the loss coefficient function in fiber transmission.
dcterms:title: Loss coefficient function
